SEARCH
Package ca.cmpt213.asn4.bank

Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
ca.cmpt213.asn4.bank.BankAccount
Direct Known Subclasses:
SavingsAccount
public abstract class BankAccount extends Object
The BankAccount class represents a generic bank account with basic functionalities such as deposits, withdrawals, interest calculation, and monthly processing. This is an abstract class, and specific account types should extend this class.

The class provides information about the account balance, number of deposits, number of withdrawals, annual interest rate, and service charges. It also includes methods to deposit, withdraw, calculate interest, update service charges, and perform monthly processing activities.

Instances of this class should be created by providing an initial balance and an annual interest rate. The initial balance and interest rate must be non-negative; otherwise, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

The monthly process involves deducting service charges, calculating monthly interest, and resetting the counters for deposits, withdrawals, and service charges.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yurii Huba
